title: Taylor Swift addresses question that 'deteriorates' her mental health
text:
Taylor Swift opens up on one question that ‘deteriorates’ her mental health (Picture: Getty Images)

Taylor Swift has got a reputation for writing songs about heartbreak and hurt.

But despite putting out a series of number one hits, usually based on her relationship breakdowns, the star is not there for being asked one particular question.

‘What will you ever do if you get happy?’ – Probably drop a banger like ME!, perhaps?

When chatting as part of NPR’s Tiny Desk concert, the 29-year-old explained how the question has had a negative impact on her mental health.

The Lover songstress stated: ‘Over the course of me doing interviews, which is about 15 or 16 years, I’ve gotten a question over and over again that I think has the potential to seriously deteriorate my mental health.

‘What will you ever do if you get happy?’ (Picture: Getty Images)

‘That question is, “What will you ever do if you get happy?” Like what will you write about? Will you just never be able to write a song again? It’s an interesting question.’

She went onto say how the words would play on her mind, as she would often go home and over think the question.

‘Would I not be able to do the thing I love the most in the world?’ TayTay said before adding: ‘Would I not be able to write breakup songs anymore?’

She laughed: ‘I love writing breakup songs. They’re so fun to write!’

She seems smitten with her beau Joe (Picture: GC Images)

Taylor’s latest album Lover is mainly based on her three-year relationship with Joe Alwyn.

However that didn’t stop the star from sneaking in a break-up track in the form of Death By A Thousand Cuts, which she claims was her proof she could still write about heartache despite being happy.

The star recently performed her title track when dropping by Saturday Night Live with her beau in tow.

And eagle-eyed fans noticed that the singer kept on looking over at Joe during her performance.

The pair have kept their relationship away from the public eye since rumours emerged that they were dating.

But if her most recent release is anything to go by, it sounds as though the famous duo are very much in love.
